basics.name: Alicia Parisse
basics.label: Engineer Student - Programmer
basics.summary:
My name is Alicia Parisse and I am an student finishing her Computer Science Engineering studies in INSA de Lyon. I come from a background where I studied more general science and discovered Computer Science during my studies. Since then I have been passioned with web programming and tried to improve my skills in this field. But what makes me different is that I am a passionate person and I akways want to learn more.

During my studies I got involved with multiple associations, being the President of the Computer Science Student Association. I had to master manager skills to lead my team and make events a great experience for the students. I have been feeling like home in the Computer Science World as it is an open-minded world that always wants to get better and to learn more.

But as a woman working in Computer Science, I discovered that there was only a few of us in this world. I found myself being a feminist and fighting for the right of girls to know about Computer Science as a world where they are welcome.

As I said, I am a passionate person, as well for my work as for my life. I will always work hard for the things I believe in, be it gender equality or my company.
basics.website-desc: I constructed this website with the JSON Resume Schema, adapting it to my needs.

work.company: University of Helsinki - RAGE Research Team
work.summary: Development of a personal dashboard for the students
highlights: Creating a whole interface for users - conception, development
Technologies used : Angular2 (javascript and typescript), gulp, express, mongodb, html, css

work.summary: Development of the Financial trajectories analysis Interface
highlights: Complete creation of the interface - conception, development, production
Knowledge acquisition in web technologies : Bootstrap, KnockOut.js

work.summary: Development of a user management solution
highlights: Developmnent of an application to manage authentication, authorization and user rights management

volunteer.summary: As the president of the association I represented the students in the eyes of the direction of the department. I was responsible for the well-being of the students inside the Computer Science department and for their integration in the life of the school. My team and I organized multiple events going from 50 to 300 persons.
highlights: Management of the relationships with the companies

volunteer.summary: As I have always been passioned by theater, I entered the association when I was a student in INSA de Lyon. I did both act and direct a play during those years. As a director, I was also part of the board of the association : we were meeting each week and organising the events given by our multiple member as well as the communication around it.
highlights: Actress in a feminist play, Les Gaillardes by Mickaël Délis
Director and actress in the play Les Justes by Albert Camus

courses: Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Computational Creativity
Programming : Genetic algorithms, string processing algorithms and Markov Chains in Python
Programming : C++, C, Java, Web (html, css, javascript)
